list.title: Sial Exhibition (Paris) 2018
list.description: Engaging business discussions at SIAL Paris, showcasing our product portfolio and exploring international partnerships with global buyers and distributors in one of the worldâ€™s leading food exhibitions.
list.detail_description: Our participation at the SIAL Paris Exhibition reflects our strong commitment to global expansion and international trade. During the event, we engaged in in-depth discussions with international buyers, distributors, and industry professionals, presenting our diverse product range and exploring new market opportunities. SIAL Paris provided an excellent platform to strengthen relationships, understand global food trends, and reinforce our brand presence in the international FMCG market.
